data.name: Full Metal Furies - Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Loved the game? Then why not jam to the music as well? This is the original soundtrack for Full Metal Furies. Composed by A Shell in the Pit, the full OST features more than an hour and a half of music, totaling 41 tracks in all. Also includes unique renditions of some tracks not found in the original game. All songs come in MP3 format along with a lossless high quality WAV version.

Check out the full tracklist below!

  • A Shell in the Pit - Full Metal Furies - 01 Inferno (Trailer Edit)
  • A Shell in the Pit - Full Metal Furies - 02 Parable
  • A Shell in the Pit - Full Metal Furies - 03 Full Metal Furies

data.short_description: Loved the game? Then why not jam to the music as well? This is the original soundtrack for Full Metal Furies. Composed by A Shell in the Pit, the full OST features more than an hour and a half of music, totaling 41 tracks in all. Also includes unique renditions of some tracks not found in the original game.
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9 or later
